// NOTE: aliases don't have spaces in them!!

// Images
// Image: <alias> <imageLocation>
// Image: potionTree ... // TODO
// Image: ViridianF ... // TODO

// Aliases
// TrainerAlias: <alias> <trainerID> // alias is how you name him, trainerID is how the application knows him as

// Custom trainers
// Trainer: <name> [:: <location>[:<sublocation>] ]:: <alias> <name>:<level> [<name>:<level> [...]] // ID will be generated by the application (?)
Trainer: Rival 1 :: Pallet Town :: rival1 bulbasaur:5
Trainer: Bug Catcher 1 :: Viridian Forest :: bug1 weedle:9
Trainer: Brock :: Pewter City :: brock geodude:12 onix:14
// Route 3
Trainer: Bug Catcher 2 :: Route 3 :: bug2 caterpie:10 weedle:10 caterpie:10

// Routes
Route: R :: Red Any% Glitchless - Paras%
	S: Early game
		GetP: #squirtle:5
		B: rival1 :: Tail Whip x1-2, then Tackle until it faints.
		D: Do parcel stuff
		D: Kill an encounter
		E: Route 1 :: 1:0 3:1 4:0 5:0
		B: bug1 :: Tail Whip x2, then Tackle until it faints.
	S: Pewter City
		B: brock :: Bubble all
	S: Route 3
		B: bug2
		B: shorts
		B: bug3
		B: bug4
		C: Route 3 :: #1
	S: Mt Moon
//		C: Mt.Moon:B2F :: #6
		M: Mt.Moon:B2F :: 6 :: 14 15 14 3 :: Manip a Paras Lv.12, DVs should be 14/15/14/3
		SwapP: 0 2
		D: Teach TM34 Bide
		TM: Bide // TEMPORARY
		B: nerd1
		E: Mt.Moon:1F :: 0:0 1:0 2:0 3:1 4:0 :: You need 98 total exp, kill two 6-9 Zubats or one 8 Geodude (98 exactly) before Hiker
		B: lassmoon
		B: hikermoon
		E: Mt.Moon:B2F :: 3:1
		B: rocketmoon
		B: nerd2
	S: Cerulean City
		D: TODO
		B: rival2
	S: Nugget Bridge
		B: bug5
		Candy: 2 :: Rare Candy to level 20 // TEMPORARY
		B: lass1
		B: youngster1
		B: lass2
		B: jrtrm1
		B: rocket1
	S: Route 25
		B: hiker1
		B: lass3
		B: jrtrm2
		B: lass4
	S: Cerulean City (Gym)
		B: rocketdig
		TM: Dig :: Bide
		B: jrtrfmisty
		B: misty
	S: Underground
		D: ...
